solution_line_template: She drank {cups_per_bottle} cups of water every hour for {hours_worked} hours so {cups_per_bottle}*{hours_worked}=<<{cups_per_bottle}*{hours_worked}={cups_drank}>>{cups_drank} cups

She poured {bottles_poured} bottles of waters on her plants and each holds {cups_per_bottle} cups so {bottles_poured}*{cups_per_bottle} = <<{bottles_poured}*{cups_per_bottle}={cups_poured}>>{cups_poured} cups of water
She drank {cups_drank} cups of water and used {cups_poured} cups of water so she had {cups_drank}+{cups_poured} = <<{cups_drank}+{cups_poured}={total_cups_used}>>{total_cups_used} cups of water
